## Description
This building grows spirulina in ponds. It is furnished with a biology research lab &#10;with instruments.

|Size:|6.0 x 9.0 m|
|Level:|0|
|Maintenance Period:|150|
|Power Demands:|2.0 kW|
|Offline Power Demands:|0.2 kW|
